metadata.synopsis: Isobel's call to action to move on and begin your approach to High Hall entry
metadata.how_to_trigger: Finish dialogue with the Goodness GroupEnter dialogue with Isobel

0.speaker: Isobel
0.text: I don't fear death. But this is not our day to die.

1.speaker: Isobel
1.text: Press on. This will all be over soon. And then - my gods, then I'm having something very strong indeed.
